headline: CAMALOT/SPEEDLINE DISPENSING SYSTEM
description:
Dispensing System    Typical Applications: 
 Solder paste 
 Surface mount and conductive adhesives 
 Gasketing 
 Encapsulation 
 Glob top and flip chip underfill 

Camalot/Speedline Technologies 1818
